title: Prologue – 1
desc: Wowie, wow! Welcome to Fight/Flight, a webcomic that I’ve planned and started making from my blood, sweat and tears! I don’t have much to say for this first page, other than that I hope you, reader, enjoy it.

title: Prologue – 11
desc: And we’re all caught up! Now to post at a much slower pace.

title: Prologue – 13
desc: Psshht.

title: Prologue – 14
desc: Hey look at that, another page

title: Prologue – 16
desc: Long time, no update! Still slow-goings right now, and I apologize for that. I’m currently in my final year of college (woo hoo!) so school work, as usual, has to come before the web comic. Thanks, you guys who stuck around, I appreciate you. You all have great patience, and that rocks! You rock! Keep on rocking, folks!

title: Prologue – 17
desc: Another comic for the comic gods. Also featuring a guest appearance from a family member.

title: Prologue – 18
desc:
Well heck! It’s certainly been a while, hasn’t it? Well! Good news! Fight/Flight is officially OFF ITS HIATUS! Yay! From now on, you guys can expect a new comic update EVERY THURSDAY!
Another important thing to mention: If you guys clicked on my Patreon to check it out and were shocked(or more likely, mildly surprised) to find absolutely nothing there, it’s because I wanted to do a bit of construction work on it. I want it looking good and pretty, that’s for sure. Still, if you’re itching to send a few bucks my way for whatever reason, my donation button still works just fine, and I always appreciate any money thrown in my face direction!
One last thing! If you’ve been following this comic on Tapastic – Well, just “Tapas” now – then you’ve probably noticed that my comic is GONE! This is because of a really terrible new policy that the Tapas team has put in their website, and if you’re a fellow comic creator, I highly recommend getting the hell off that site before they completely screw you over.
Anyways! That’s all for now, folks! See you again next Thursday!

title: Prologue – 19
desc:
Ahoy, fellow comic-readers! It’s that time again! Yes, time for another update! Happy June! And happy birthday to all you people born today!
Not much else! Have a great day!

title: Prologue – 20
desc: Happy Thursday again! Another comic update, here for you!

title: Prologue – 21
desc:
Happy Thursday, everybody!
Hey, look at that! New characters! Important characters? Who knows? We’ll see! Also, I promise there won’t be a whole lot of “bathroom humor” in this comic, if you’re grossed out by that kind of thing (like my mom is). That big wolf monster just kinda scared a whole lot out of poor Walt.

title: Prologue – 22
desc:
Happy Thursday! Here’s some yelling! AAAAHHH! By the way, I hope you guys appreciate that cabinet full of junk in panel 4! Because that took WAY too long to do.
Also! Just so you guys know, I will be gone the week of the 4th of July for a wedding. This is probably not going  to effect the comic schedule! But I just wanted to put that out there in case it does, or if anything else happens. Who knows? It’s always good to plan ahead, that’s what I always say.

title: Prologue – 23
desc:
And we’re back!
Thank you for your patience, everyone! I had a great time away from home! After my cousin’s wedding, me and my family had ourselves a time in Chicago on the 4th of July. Fireworks over that kinda skyline are definitely a sight to behold. Not much else to say, really! Have a great remainder of the week, y’all!

title: Prologue – 24
desc:
Happy Thursday, Everybody!
Here’s the latest, with the brand new guy who swears like a sailor! He’s going to be around a lot!
Anyways, see you guys next week!

title: Prologue – 25
desc:
Thursday again, and with another Thursday comes another comic! See you guys on the first Thursday of next month!
EDIT: Hey guys! Sorry about the lack of an update this fine August morning! For reasons, I couldn’t get the new page out this week, but I also figured I definitely needed some spare time to breathe.
Juggling this comic with work on my own is some tough stuff, especially since I don’t get paid for doing what I do here. I just need a bit of time so I can get the next page done, but also work on a Hiveworks application — And, like I said, time to breathe. The new page will be up next week — I’d like to apologize again for the delay.

title: Prologue – 26
desc:
Heya howdy! It’s page 26!
Why’s this Galanos fellow so angry at Walt? What’s Walt seeing that we don’t? Find out next week!

title: Prologue – 27
desc:
Happy Thursday, everybody! And to everyone who’s back in school — Welcome back! And keep on trucking! It’s tough, but it won’t last forever!
Nothing special to note this week, by the way. I’m still working on that Hiveworks application to make it the best that I can. Oh! And hey! If you like Fight/Flight, remember that I’ve got a Twitter you guys can follow so you can get a nifty little reminder whenever Fight/Flight updates, and some other cool junk in the future, probably!
And finally! Please remember to spread the word about this comic! I appreciate it!

title: Prologue – 28
desc:
Happy Thursday, folks!
I’ve decided to start putting all Fight/Flight shirts on Teepublic.com! Well, the one that I have. And future ones! So hey, at some point the link to my store is going to switch to a better site with higher quality shirts! Be on the lookout, because all shirts will be $20, BUT for the first three days that they’re put up, they’ll be only $14! Cheaper? Yes. Rad? Hell yes.
Oh by the way, fun fact, Walt is 6’4″.

title: Prologue – 29
desc: Oh boy now we’re really getting somewhere.

title: Prologue – 30
desc: And that’s all, folks! See you on Oct 5th!

title: Chapter 1 – Infestation
desc: And we’re back. Here’s an idea of what’s to come!

title: Chapter 1 – 1
desc:
EDIT: Hey guys, I’m not gonna make it in time to post the comic this week. Real sorry about that. NEXT week, the comic will be up for sure! Life’s up to no good, it seems!
It’s page 1! Happy Thursday!
Who’s this new lady? What’s with the wacky colors? Well, hold your horses! That’ll get cleared up! Just be patient! Jeez!
Well, have a great not-quite-halloween-yet, everyone! See you again real soon!
Asterix and Obelix belong to Hachette Livre Publishing

title: Chapter 1 – 2
desc:
Hey everyone! It’s a new week with a new page!
I’m trying to experiment with different coloring styles to make sure I can get these pages out faster! It’s normally the coloring that eats up all my time with these pages! And that’s no good! So I’ll be doing my best to fix that.
I hope everyone has a happy Halloween!

title: Chapter 1 – 3
desc:
Happy Thursday! Time for a new page!
It’s a new day! With a new mission! With some guy who definitely doesn’t want to murder Walt! Crumch.

title: Chapter 1 – 4
desc:
Happy Thursday!
It’s almost Thanksgiving! You know what that means! It means there won’t be a new (canon) comic next week! But there WILL be A comic, you feel? What that comic is, however, is a surprise. All you need to know is that it’ll be done in pencil. And not be canon.
Have a good one, everybody!
